function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of understanding of the impact of buildings on occupant health","Impact":"Potential negative impact on occupant health and well-being","Mitigation":"Conduct comprehensive research and analysis to understand the impact of buildings on occupant health","Technologies":"Health assessment tools, data analytics, sensors for indoor air quality monitoring","People":"Occupants of buildings","Owner":"Research institutions, building professionals, health experts"},{"Description":"Low adoption of health objectives by building practitioners","Impact":"Reduced integration of health objectives into building design, construction, and operation","Mitigation":"Promote education and awareness about the benefits of healthy buildings among building practitioners","Technologies":"Training programs, certification courses, educational resources on healthy building practices","People":"Building practitioners, architects, engineers","Owner":"Health organizations, building industry associations, educational institutions"},{"Description":"Limited understanding and awareness of health in buildings among building professionals","Impact":"Inadequate consideration of health factors during building design and operation","Mitigation":"Increase education and training on health in buildings for building professionals","Technologies":"Online courses, workshops, seminars on health-conscious building design and operation","People":"Building professionals, architects, engineers, facility managers","Owner":"Professional development organizations, industry associations, educational institutions"}]}
